Comment: So many guardrails have proven to not actually exist.  Impeachment is demonstrably useless as a form of checks and balance.  SCOTUS and the Legislative Branch have ceded power to the Presidency.  The DOJ has proven it existentially cannot hold the Executive accountable.  Democrats had 2020-2024 to do something about Trump and MAGA-ism in the federal government and chose to do nothing.  America as we believed it never really existed. For all his terribleness, Trump has lifted the veil here to show our form of government actually doesn't work. If we want to future proof against another demagogue like Trump, we need to overhaul the whole system, but it's much more likely Trump will overhaul the whole system, for better or for worse, before anyone gets a chance to stop him.
